    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemie

        public Enemie(int num,
              int row,
              java.lang.String mode,
              boolean faster)
        Constructor for an Enemie object.
        Parameters:
        num - The number of enemies to be spawned.
        row - The row to spawn the enemies at.
        mode - The difficulty level.
        faster - Are the enemies moving 5x faster than normal?
